channel.title: Comments for page "Dealer's Room"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dealer's Room"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Thanks, bro, but this stuff already on the page at "stuffs" tab :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Found something new: Fighting Headband 25M
(Size 1 Stuffs - Increase Glowslinging Wanders)

I had Free Cosplay Piece, Day 2, The Beast Deal Modifiers.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So like I said, it's like a juice that gets used immediately and becomes an effect XD

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: it's not a consumeable, it's a Permanent Effect, like Age Limit or Backstage Pass, in this case, one you can buy.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: @msilver… The reason the question was asked about the extra suitcase is because it is in fact listed as a consumable. If the chart is correct, it works like a juice… It's a consumable, but by buying it you instantly consume it.

item.title: Fighting Headband requirements
item.content:encoded:
Apparently, The Beast is not a requirement for it to show up, because I got it without having The Beast.
Changing to "no requirement" until proven otherwise.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Is there any point to having the table of cosplay part stats? Due to the ever-changing nature of the stats, it seems a bit pointless keeping it, especially unfinished.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Perfect-Grade Ride do not give Flow when u buy it, only when u equip it on the next Con(and all after :) ), not like Low-Cut Kimono, that gives bonus even at the Con u buy it.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmâ€¦ I'll check this con I think :) Btw, what actually does Personal Translator? XP from what deals shown in description?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, you can take both with you, but the idea is that no matter how many you take with you, you only get the effect of one, other than energy drinks/clothes/noms.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I've bought 2 DJ Tabbles and at beginning of a Con I had a possibility to take both with maself like Noms :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
It was already asked and answered that you can't benefit from more than one instance of a non-consumable item (consumable being case of energy drinks, the only thing known so far that you can benefit from packing more than one of).

The point that bonuses don't stack might be worth to be mentioned at Deals > Overview.

item.title: Psycho Zombja Girl Cosplay
item.content:encoded: Head is worth 2d7

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It was already asked and answered that you can't benefit from more than one instance of a non-consumable item (consumable being case of energy drinks, the only thing known so far that you can benefit from packing more than one of).

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: anyone know if it is possible to get more than one suitcase?

item.title: (no title)

item.content:encoded: I question the usefulness of this data, since the bonuses of the cosplay pieces changes between every con for the better or worse.

item.content:encoded: Larry head gives 3d6+2 ad the combo bonus is 1d4

You could possibly buy a 2nd but it only one works.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Is it possible to get more than one extra suitcase, or are you limited to one?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I added the column label to the rest of the tables for the Deals tabs.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I think the "days" column only worked for the stuffs category, there's a column with no header on the others.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I have lvl 0 knowledge, and got this at the dealer's room:

Shopping Results: 3 Deals Found!
Difficulty 4 Roll: 10 8
+6 Shopping XP!
Deal Modifiers: Low Knowledge, Day 2

item.title: Greasemonkey script
item.content:encoded:
We have a script that logs both the Dealer Room deals and the Cosplay stats. Maintaining this into the wiki is too much work. We'll add the data here after we have it figured out from the database. Please use the script and help out (the script can be found on the page itself).

Thank you.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I found the Robot Butler (though I annoyingly can't afford it) and it says +2 Cool and +2 Noms overnight, not +2 Sleep as someone else has recorded. Anyone else get Cool instead of Sleep from this item?

item.title: Cosplay Prop info
item.content:encoded:
I have both Su-chan and Lil' Ro Prop Cosplay parts, I got Lil Ro's part on the 1st Billycon on Saturday and Su-chan was on the 2nd BillyCon on Sunday.
This is what they read as of 09/01/2010 at 1am billytime
Cosplays
Lil' Ro

Head: (???)
Body: (???)
Prop: Qty: 1 (3d6-1)
Combo: (2d5-2)

Su-chan

Head: (???)
Body: (???)
Prop: Qty: 1 (2d8-2)
Combo: (1d7-3)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Probably not. McM said they're about half completely random.

Also, we need to start keeping track of what Day the Stuffs are found, because I understand some things are easier/only found on certain days.

item.title: Fluctuating cosplay stats
item.content:encoded:
So the stats for the cosplay parts change slightly over time.
How are we going to write that down in the wiki?
Should we for now just add all the difference stats we encounter?
